pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Inference in Complex Innovative Trial Design // Perform robust estimation and inference in platform trials and other master protocol trials. Yuhan Qian, Yifan Yi, Jun Shao, Yanyao Yi, Gregory Levin, Nicole Mayer-Hamblett, Patrick J. Heagerty, Ting Ye (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2411.12944.
